pluggable.name: Lock Out
pluggable.author: The Habari Community
pluggable.description: Redirect users not logged in to a login form.

help.value:
After activating this, all users not yet logged in will be redirected to a login form. Note that you should still probably edit the Anonymous group permissions.

Note also that users will not be able to retrieve your feeds. This may be addressed in a future version.
